languages.text: "Твоя жизнь коротка, но ты все равно стремишься к смерти. Словно догорающая комета, падающая на звезду".
"Your life is already short, and yet, still you charge toward death. Like a flaming comet falling into a star."
languages.original_text: "Твоя жизнь коротка, но ты все равно стремишься к смерти. Словно догорающая комета, падающая на звезду".

traits.locale_text: "Your life is short, but still you charge toward death. Like a burning comet falling upon a star."
"Your life is short, but still you charge toward death. Like a burning comet falling upon a star."
"Your life is already short, and yet, still you charge toward death. Like a flaming comet falling into a star."
"Your life is already short, and yet, still you charge toward death. Like a flaming comet falling into a star."
"Your life is already short, and yet, still you charge toward death. Like a flaming comet falling into a star."
"Your life is already short, and yet, still you charge toward death. Like a flaming comet falling into a star."
"Your life is already short, and yet, still you charge toward death. Like a flaming comet falling into a star."

languages.text: "Euer Leben ist bereits kurz und doch stürmt Ihr auf den Tod zu. Wie ein flammender Komet, der in einen Stern stürzt."
languages.original_text: "Your life is already short, and yet, still you charge toward death. Like a flaming comet falling into a star."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Leben ist bereits kurz und doch stürmt Ihr auf den Tod zu. Wie ein flammender Komet, der in einen Stern stürzt."

languages.text: « Votre vie est déjà fort brève, et pourtant, vous vous obstinez à courir au-devant de la mort, comme une comète en feu qui irait percuter une étoile. »
languages.original_text: "Your life is already short, and yet, still you charge toward death. Like a flaming comet falling into a star."

traits.locale_text: « Votre vie est déjà fort brève, et pourtant, vous vous obstinez à courir au-devant de la mort, comme une comète en feu qui irait percuter une étoile. »

languages.text: «Tu vida es corta pero corres hacia la muerte, como un cometa ardiente abalanzándose hacia una estrella».
languages.original_text: "Your life is already short, and yet, still you charge toward death. Like a flaming comet falling into a star."

traits.locale_text: «Tu vida es corta pero corres hacia la muerte, como un cometa ardiente abalanzándose hacia una estrella».

languages.text: 「人生は短い。なのにお前は死に近付こうとしている。まるで星に落ちる炎の彗星のように」
languages.original_text: "Your life is already short, and yet, still you charge toward death. Like a flaming comet falling into a star."

traits.locale_text: 「人生は短い。なのにお前は死に近付こうとしている。まるで星に落ちる炎の彗星のように」

languages.text: “你的生命本来就已经很短暂了，但你依然冲向死亡，仿佛熊熊燃烧的彗星坠入恒星之中。”
languages.original_text: "Your life is already short, and yet, still you charge toward death. Like a flaming comet falling into a star."

traits.locale_text: “你的生命本来就已经很短暂了，但你依然冲向死亡，仿佛熊熊燃烧的彗星坠入恒星之中。”

languages.original_text: "Your life is already short, and yet, still you charge toward death. Like a flaming comet falling into a star."

languages.text: "Ömrün hâlihazırda kısa. Yine de ölüme doğru koşuyorsun. Yıldıza çarpan alev içinde bir kuyruklu yıldız gibisin."
languages.original_text: "Your life is already short, and yet, still you charge toward death. Like a flaming comet falling into a star."
